title: RP PURCHASE ERROR SOMEONE FROM RIOT HELP ME?
body: i'm trying to buy RP but when i press RP purchase it gives me an error and saying that my session had expired how can i get over it?

replies.body: A session expiration usually requires a relog or store refresh to fix, but there could be more underlying issues.  For example, the store uses Internet Explorer to function, so there may be some settings that have messed up, and a reset to default could help fix it.  Go over the steps in the[ store guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753054-Store-Error-Session-Expired-There-was-a-problem-with-your-request-), and let me know if you still have any issues!
